tidyzoning 0.1.1
  • Reference

Run initial check functions

tz_all_checks.Rd

tz_initial_checks() runs the initial tidyzoning check functions to see if certain attributes of the building are allowed in the parcel.

Usage

tz_all_checks(
  tidybuilding,
  tidyzoning,
  tidyparcel_dims,
  tidyparcel_geo = NULL,
  detailed_check = FALSE,
  run_check_land_use = TRUE,
  run_check_height = TRUE,
  run_check_height_eave = TRUE,
  run_check_floors = TRUE,
  run_check_unit_size = TRUE,
  run_check_far = TRUE,
  run_check_unit_density = TRUE,
  run_check_lot_coverage = TRUE,
  run_check_fl_area = TRUE,
  run_check_unit_qty = TRUE,
  run_check_footprint = FALSE
)

Arguments

tidybuilding

A tidybuilding is a list of data frames used to represent a building.

tidyzoning

A tidyzoning simple features object representing the zoning districts and regulations for an area.

tidyparcel_dims

A data frame with each tidyparcel and its information. The zoning_id column in the tidyparcel_with_dimensions must correspond to the row numbers of the tidyzoning object.

tidyparcel_geo

A data frame with each parcel side and its geometry

detailed_check

When TRUE, every parcel passes through each check no matter the result, and it take more time. When FALSE, subsequent checks are skipped as soon as one check reads FALSE

run_check_land_use

Should the analysis run the check_land_use function

run_check_height

Should the analysis run the check_height function

run_check_height_eave

Should the analysis run the check_height_eave function

run_check_floors

Should the analysis run the check_floors function

run_check_unit_size

Should the analysis run the check_unit_size function

run_check_far

Should the analysis run the check_far function

run_check_unit_density

Should the analysis run the check_unit_density function

run_check_lot_coverage

Should the analysis run the check_lot_coverage function

run_check_fl_area

Should the analysis run the check_fl_area function

run_check_unit_qty

Should the analysis run the check_unit_qty function

run_check_footprint

Should the analysis run the check_footprint function

Value

A data frame with initial check function results.
